-Fully working bank tabs -Full summoning system -Fully updated clan chat, ranks, lootshare, setup, interface -Fully functioning castle wars -Revents with unique combat system -10 plus minigames, even blast furnace -Kill streak system -Perfected combat and pking and bridding -Awesome for skillers -10+ Bosses to battle for great rewards -Great economy -Minimal bugs -Upgradable weapons -Unique teleport interface -unique barrows minigame -Fully working money pouch -All bank buttons work -quick prayers -All weapon/armour - specials/bonuses/effects -Daily events and updates -Fun pking area -Unique player vs boss combat system -Clue scrolls -Great quest tab with info -User loyalty titles -Great donator benefits -A lot of time put into the game
[/center]
